mapper.sql: select t1.id as id, t1.prerecv_code as preRecvCode, t1.purchase_code as purchaseCode, t1.pur_prepared_time as purPreparedTime, t1.pur_prepared_by as purPreparedBy, t1.posting_no as postingNo, t1.warehouse_id as warehouseId, t1.warehouse_name as warehouseName, t1.supplier_id as supplierId, t1.supplier_name as supplierName, t1.prepared_by as preparedBy, t1.prepared_time as preparedTime, t1.handling_status as handlingStatus, t1.handled_time as handledTime, t1.handled_by as handledBy, t1.receive_id as receiveId, t1.receive_code as receiveCode, t1.remark as remark
mapper.insert:
select WMS_SEQ_COMMON.nextval from dual
insert into wms_pur_prerecv (id, prerecv_code, posting_no, purchase_code, pur_prepared_time, pur_prepared_by, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, supplier_id, supplier_name, prepared_time, prepared_by, handling_status, handled_time, handled_by, remark) values (#{id}, #{preRecvCode}, #{postingNo}, #{purchaseCode}, #{purPreparedTime}, #{purPreparedBy}, #{warehouseId}, #{warehouseName}, #{supplierId}, #{supplierName}, #{preparedTime}, #{preparedBy}, #{handlingStatus}, #{handledTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{handledBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select t1.id as id, t1.sku_id as skuId, t1.sku_code as skuCode, t1.sku_name as skuName, t1.quantity as quantity, t1.measure_unit as measureUnit, t1.product_batchno as productBatchNo, t1.indiv_enabled as indivEnabled, t1.prerecv_id as "purPreRecv.id", t2.prerecv_code as "purPreRecv.preRecvCode", t2.purchase_code as "purPreRecv.purchaseCode", t2.posting_no as "purPreRecv.postingNo", t2.warehouse_id as "purPreRecv.warehouseId", t2.warehouse_name as "purPreRecv.warehouseName", t2.handling_status as "purPreRecv.handlingStatus" from wms_pur_prerecv_goods t1 join wms_pur_prerecv t2 on t1.prerecv_id=t2.id where t1.prerecv_id=#{purchaseId}
